result.execSummary:
The defendant Anthony Russell was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: DNA Surchage and costs to be paid as a condition of probation on case 16CM168.  Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
With Huber release for standard release conditions including release for child care.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Anthony Russell

Jury trial - 12 person at 02-02-2016 08:15 am
Jury status hearing at 01-28-2016 08:30 am

Defendant Anthony Russell in court with attorney Craig Michael Kuhary.  Stephen Joseph Centinario appeared for the State of Wisconsin. The trial is adjourned for the reasons stated in the letter dated 12/9/15 filed by the State as the Defendant has been referred on  new charges.   The Court grants the adjournment request and sets the matter for trial.  Jury status hearing scheduled for January 28, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for February 2, 2016 at 08:15 am.
From State dated 12/9/15 will be requesting adjournment of trial during status.
Filed by State.
Jury trial - 12 person at 12-15-2015 08:30 am
Jury status hearing at 12-10-2015 10:30 am

Attorney Craig Michael Kuhary in court.   Defendant Anthony Russell did not appear.   Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney appears by authorization.  The parties are still in negotiation and Attorney Kuhary requests the matter be set for trial.  Jury status hearing scheduled for December 10, 2015 at 10:30 am.  Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for December 15, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Authorization to appear received and filed.
Hearing at 10-19-2015 09:30 am

The Court modifies the conditions of the signature bond to:  Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness except for visitation issues and childcare issues by telephonic means.   The only contact allowed with victim is in regards to child.  Defendant is not to possess any knives/weapons/firearms.

Attorney Craig Michael Kuhary in court.   Defendant Anthony Russell did not appear.   Lesli S Boese appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court waives the defendant's appearance today. Authorization to be filed. Defense requests another date for 3 weeks. State needs to undergo further investigation on this matter. Defense addresses the defendant's bond.  Court orders conditions of bond be modified. Court will give another date.  Hearing scheduled for October 19, 2015 at 09:30 am.
Hearing on September 14, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Anthony Russell in court with attorney Craig Michael Kuhary.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Kuhary was just retained and needs to obtain materials from the DA's office. Discovery and offer handed to defense counsel. Court will give another date in 3 weeks.  Hearing scheduled for September 14, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Hearing on August 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.

The Court modifies the conditions of the signature bond to:  Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness listed in the Criminal Complaint.   The only contact allowed with victim is in regards to child.  Defendant is not to possess any knives/weapons/firearms.

Defendant Anthony Russell in court.  Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The Court calls the matter to address the request to modify bail.  The States moves the Court to order no contact with the victim.  The Defendant is in the process of obtaining counsel.   The Court modifies the conditions of the  $1000.00 signature bond to:  Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness listed in the Criminal Complaint.   Defendant is not to possess any knives/weapons/firearms.  Hearing scheduled for August 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Hearing on June 29, 2015 at 08:15 am.
Hearing on July 27, 2015 at 10:00 am.
to modify bail condition to no contact with the victim instead of no violent contact
Defendant to have no violent contact with victim/witness listed in the Criminal Complaint.   Defendant is not to possess any knives/weapons/firearms.

Defendant Anthony Russell in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Court advises of right to an attorney. Defendant will be obtaining his own private counsel.   NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for July 27, 2015 at 10:00 am.
